atom:content.xhtml:div:
yulup-0.2.2-r22511.xpi (February 07, 2007)
Changelog:
Fixed rewriting of anchor tags which act as targets.
Fixed keyboard focus problem when opening a new editor.
Only open a new tab if it makes sense.
Use WebDAV to query the site tree.
Fixed re-opening of already opened collection nodes.
Improved positioning of dialogs and position persistence.
Show only editor toolbar icons by default.
